text: int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i = 0 , j = 0 , c1 , c2 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { c1 = a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ i ] [ j ] ; c2 = a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; if ( c1 > c2 ) { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = c1 ; } else { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = c2 ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
